src.sarahwissocq.armandbour.yougotmail.models.mail

Interface Mail<T extends Content>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The Content of the mail.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AcknowledgmentOfReceipt, DecorativeLetter, Letter, PromissoryNote, RegisteredLetter, SimpleLetter, ThanksLetter, UrgentLetter

    public interface Mail<T extends Content>
    The Mail interface lists all the methods necessary for a class to act like something sent by mail.
    Author:
    Armand BOUR, Sarah WISSOCQ

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void action()
      Executes a certain action to be done upon receiving the mail.
      T getContent()
      Gets the content of the mail.
      float getCost()
      Gets the mailing cost of the item.
      Inhabitant getReceiver()
      Gets the receiver of the mail.
      Inhabitant getSender()
      Gets the sender of the mail.
